description: Write a function that checks if a path matches a safe pattern (e.g., only alphanumerics, dots, hyphens, underscores, and single slashes). Return true if valid, false otherwise. Must handle empty string safely. Example (Valid): matchesSafePattern("/home/user_123/file-01.txt") -> true. Example (Invalid): matchesSafePattern("/home/../etc/passwd") -> false.
